roleset.name: to settle conflicts

example.name: adjudicate-v: both args
example.text: This celebrated treatise , usually known as " The Art of Courtly Love " , lies at the origin of the legend of the Courts of Love , tribunals before which lovers were supposed to bring their quarrels in order to have them adjudicated by authorities in the art of love like Eleanor of Aquitaine and her daughter .

propbank.arg: by authorities in the art of love like Eleanor of Aquitaine and her daughter

example.name: adjudication-n
example.text: It appears that if according to the existing " Penal Code " adjudication , without a doubt , even if the vast majority of corrupt officials do n't reach the level of " crimes deserving of dying ten thousand deaths " , they 're sufficient to be crimes deserving of dying ten times , a hundred times , a thousand times .

roleset.note: ADJUDICATE-V NOTES: Text example found in the BNC; nominal 'adjudication' based on BOLT-6. No Vncls. (from adjudicate.01-v)
ADJUDICATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from adjudication.01-n)
